articles.title: Britney Spears' false claims about Wembanyama encounter are pathetic - San Antonio Express-News
articles.description: Spears accused a Wemby bodyguard of “physical violence.” Video makes clear no such thing happened. The brief encounter in a Vegas resort was a nothingburger.
